content: <articles>    <article xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink/">   <front>     <article-meta>       <title-group>         <article-title>Monograph on the spittlebug flies, genus Cladochaeta (Diptera, Drosophilidae, Cladochaetini)</article-title>       </title-group>       <contrib-group>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Nguyen</surname>             <given-names>Tam</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>American Museum of Natural History, AMNH</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>         <contrib contrib-type="author">           <name>             <surname>Grimaldi</surname>             <given-names>David A.</given-names>           </name>           <aff>             <institution>American Museum of Natural History, AMNH</institution>           </aff>         </contrib>       </contrib-group>       <pub-date pub-type="pub">         <year>1999</year>       </pub-date>       <self-uri xlink:href="http://zenodo.org/record/15815"/>       <self-uri xlink:href="https://zenodo.org/record/15815/files/Grimaldi_1999_B241-0002.pdf"/>     </article-meta>     <abstract><p>Uploaded by Plazi</p></abstract>   </front>   <article-type>publication</article-type> </article>   </articles>
